name: Land of Destruction
description:
Version 0.0.2

Here you can run around, build, blow things up, dodge lava balls from the Lava monster, and eventually battle it out with Satan himself!

Controls: (left arrow key: Left) (Right arrow key: Right) (Down Arrow key: Stop)

(space bar: Jump) 

click on any block within your view to destroy it, collect sword ore to fight monsters but click 1 when you are done or else the camera will not follow you...

Right click on any block (except water ,stone and lava) to create a TNT block, Left click that block to let it Blow up. For stone click on your mouse wheel to create a TNT block from that.

Right click to build. 

Left click on Lava to turn it into stone.

To get to the final dimension you have to find the right lava pool and jump into the right lava block inside that pool, if you jump in any others, you will die. 

Click the S Key to save your world

Click the P key to pause your game.

Modes Easy, Normal, and Hard all have respawning but if you click on impossible you will only get one life.

you cannot build in caves, or above ground in impossible mode. 

if you die with a sword in your hand be sure to click 1 or else your screen will freeze on the spot you died in.

When loading the game click "Skip instillation."
